$IOTA #IOTA is a buy right now. We dropped down to the 200 day moving average and are currently bouncing back from 50ma. Golden cross already happend and fundamentals stronger than ever. Coordicide alphanet already out. "hack" was a 3rd party vulnerability, just like electrum.

The coordinated efforts of the past week have been some of the most rapid and professional I've seen in a long time. Mistakes were made, but the team at the #IOTA Foundation is top notch, and the response and efforts taken to be transparent have been amazing to be a part of.
